about.title: About TooliBox
about.intro: TooliBox is a free online tool platform designed to make your daily tasks easier. From text processing to image editing, we provide simple and powerful tools.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We do not collect any personal information unless you voluntarily provide it through our feedback form. All tools run locally in your browser whenever possible.

usage.title: How We Use Your Data
usage.content: Any data you provide through feedback forms is used solely to improve our services and respond to your inquiries. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use Cloudflare for content delivery and DDoS protection. We may use analytics services to understand how our website is used, but these do not track personally identifiable information.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using TooliBox, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

license.title: Use License
license.content: TooliBox grants you a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use our tools for lawful purposes only.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our tools are provided 'as is' without any warranties. We are not responsible for any damages or losses resulting from the use of our tools.
